actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.
Senate Committee on Foreign Relations discharged by Unanimous Consent.
Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

official_title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate that it is the interest of both the United States and the Republic of Korea to maintain and inhance continued close U.S-ROK relations, and to commend President Kim Dae Jung and the Republic of Korea for the measures already implemented and those it has committed to implement to resolve the country's economic and financial problems.

summary.text: Urges the United States and the Republic of Korea to continue to advance bilateral security and economic and political ties. Commends President Kim Dae Jung and the Republic of Korea for measures already implemented and measures it has committed to implement to resolve the country's economic and financial problems.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate that it is the interest of both the United States and the Republic of Korea to maintain and inhance continued close U.S-ROK relations, and to commend President Kim Dae Jung and the Republic of Korea for the measures already implemented and those it has committed to implement to resolve the country's economic and financial problems.
